mapper.insert: insert into authc_menu (id, sort, parent_id, name, href, status, permission, icon) values (#{id}, #{sort}, #{parentId}, #{name}, #{href}, #{status}, #{permission}, #{icon})
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM authc_menu a where parent_id=#{0} order by sort
(SELECT a.* FROM authc_menu a where a.parent_id=#{0} order by a.sort) UNION (SELECT b.* FROM authc_menu a LEFT JOIN authc_menu b on b.parent_id=a.id where a.parent_id=#{0} order by a.sort)
select max(id) from authc_menu where parent_id=#{0};
SELECT * FROM authc_menu a where parent_id=#{0} and status=3 order by sort

select a.* from authc_menu a LEFT JOIN authc_menu b on b.id=a.parent_id JOIN authc_role_menu c on c.menu_id=a.id JOIN authc_role d on d.id=c.role_id JOIN authc_user_role e ON e.role_id = d.id JOIN authc_user f on f.id=e.user_id and f.login_name=#{0}
mapper.update: update authc_menu set sort = #{sort}, parent_id = #{parentId}, name = #{name}, href = #{href}, status = #{status}, icon = #{icon}, permission = #{permission} where id = #{id}
